page.title: 07BULK MILK COLLECTION
page.content: The Bulk Milk Collection Company is about 52 years old. It was formed in 1933. The milk is collected from the dairy farms. The milk tankers go to collect it. When it is collected it goes to five different dairies. They are at Alfreton, Burton, Nottingham, Hartington and Nestles in Ashbourne. At the depot there are 25 milk tankers and 41 people work there altogether. Every tanker holds 9092 litres of milk. The depot is in Ashbourne. The manager organises the routes and makes sure everyone does their job. He lives in Yeaveley. The milk tankers go to about 26 different farms each, every day of the year, even Christmas Day.
